text: ”hrux hı than mi ban thi pradabprada wi hnung hlang hrux than khun pi bn chan fa læa rea ca mi sraththa sahrab kar khun pi khxng than cnkwa than ca na khamphir lem hnung lng ma hı rea di xan” cng klaw theid “mha brisuththi hæng phracea khxng chan chan midi pen xun dı nxkcak pen mnusʹy pen rx sul”
